claw.shenron.transformation

Class BlockTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.shenron.transformation.Transformation
      • claw.shenron.transformation.BlockTransformation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClawBlockTransformation

    public abstract class BlockTransformation
extends Transformation
    A BlockTransformation is an extension of the standard Transformation that is defined by a start directive and an additional end directive. The transformation is then applied on the structured block between the two directive.
    Author:
    clementval
